# cloudconnexa_vpn_regions (Data Source)

Use a `cloudconnexa_vpn_regions` data source to read all CloudConnexa VPN regions.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `regions` (List of Object) The list of regions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--regions))

<a id="nestedatt--regions"></a>

Read-Only:

- `continent` (String)
- `country` (String)
- `country_iso` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
